tool_description: Optimizes travel routes for technicians with multiple assignments, considering traffic patterns, appointment windows, and service durations.

technician_assignments.description: Assignments for route optimization in format 'technician_id:work_order_id:location:time_window'

optimization_method.description: Route optimization algorithm: shortest_distance, shortest_time, balanced

include_lunch_breaks.description: Whether to include lunch break scheduling

traffic_consideration.description: Whether to consider real-time traffic data

error_messages: Route calculation failed: Unable to generate feasible routes for one or more technicians
Invalid optimization method: Use one of [shortest_distance, shortest_time, balanced]
Time window conflicts: Some assignments have conflicting time requirements
usage: Provide technician assignments to generate optimized daily routes. Enable traffic_consideration for more accurate time estimates.

optimized_routes.description: Optimized route sequences for each technician

total_travel_time.description: Total travel time across all optimized routes in minutes

estimated_completion.description: Estimated completion times for each technician's route

route_efficiency.description: Route efficiency score (percentage improvement over basic routing)
